Posted By: DacenOctavio (5/3/2011 12:46:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Just awesome.
  
   
Green had so few answers to creatures (barring artifacts that all colors had access to), and now it gets one that's cheap *and* an instant. But that's not all: it hits 'walkers directly, which was something that green could not do well outside the combat step. It's looking like a fantastic card for any permutation of casual / multiplayer / EDH formats.
posts.html:
Just awesome.

Green had so few answers to creatures (barring artifacts that all colors had access to), and now it gets one that's cheap and an instant. But that's not all: it hits 'walkers directly, which was something that green could not do well outside the combat step. It's looking like a fantastic card for any permutation of casual / multiplayer / EDH formats.

Posted By: Magic-Master (8/18/2011 4:46:58 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Even if you shouldn't find a nice target on your opponent's side to use this on *(which is very unlikely, unless your opponent has only some harmless little chump blockers or a lot of stuff with shroud or hexproof)*, you could always use it on your side if you can make better use of it.  
Especially if you have something like [Hatching Plans](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hatching Plans). Or simply a spare land (which might be the case in the late game).

Posted By: TherealphatMatt (7/27/2011 8:49:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
You know, a few of you think it's great for taking out blightsteel. It isn't. Blightsteel is indestructible.  
  
@ stille\_nacht: black has always had life-gain in the form of vampires haven't they? Blood-sucking creatures are part of blacks domain.  
  
I have to say, this card doesn't make sense flavour wise. Lands, ok, that's a bit of a stretch depending on the land. Planeswalkers (except Karn) make sense because they're already biological. But enchantments? Artifacts? That makes no sense.  
  
Know what'd be awesome tho? Make a huge (or infinite) 1/1 army. Use beast within and some duplicate combo to turn it into a 3/3 beast army. Precursor Golem and Xenograft would do, although there's bound to be another, better way to do it.
posts.html:
You know, a few of you think it's great for taking out blightsteel. It isn't. Blightsteel is indestructible.

@ stille_nacht: black has always had life-gain in the form of vampires haven't they? Blood-sucking creatures are part of blacks domain.

I have to say, this card doesn't make sense flavour wise. Lands, ok, that's a bit of a stretch depending on the land. Planeswalkers (except Karn) make sense because they're already biological. But enchantments? Artifacts? That makes no sense.

Know what'd be awesome tho? Make a huge (or infinite) 1/1 army. Use beast within and some duplicate combo to turn it into a 3/3 beast army. Precursor Golem and Xenograft would do, although there's bound to be another, better way to do it.
